title: btcltcdigger
author: btcltcdigger
content: ★ WEBSITE ★ TWITTER ★ DISCORD ★ TELEGRAM ★ WHITEPAPER ★ CONTEST LINK ★Launched in 2012, Peercoin, the first and oldest Proof-of-Stake blockchain, is the original pioneer of sustainable, green blockchain technology. For the first time, Peercoin replaced energy intensive mining with a consensus protocol based on time scarcity, giving all coin owners the power to produce new blocks.August 19, 2022 marks the 10th anniversary of both the Peercoin blockchain, and Proof-of-Stake consensus. Over the past decade, Peercoin has proven that it is possible for a blockchain to be secured without dependence on energy consumption from mining. 10 years of stable, sustainable operation (with no downtime) is a testament to the quality of the network, consensus protocol, community, team and overall vision.To celebrate our first decade of successful operation, we’re holding a contest with 8,000 coins as prizes donated by the Peercoin Foundation.How to Participate, Prize Pool & Tasks to CompleteContest link: https://app.fyre.hypersign.id/form/peer-into-the-future-10th-anniversary-contestContest Dates: August 16 - August 31, 2022Prize Pool: 8,000 PPC; 500 Total WinnersPrize Distribution:   Top 10: 100 PPC   11-50: 50 PPC   51-100: 20 PPC   101-500 (Lucky Draw): 10 PPCTasks: To enter Peercoin’s 10th anniversary contest, you must complete the following tasks:Follow Peercoin on Coinmarketcap: 50 pointsFollow the Peercoin on Twitter: 15 pointsJoin Peercoin  group: 15 pointsJoin Peercoin Discord server: 15 pointsLike&Retweet Peercoin Anniversary Contest Tweet and Tag Three Friends: 25 pointsFollow Peercoin on reddit: 15 pointsSubscribe to Peercoin YouTube channel: 15 pointsProvide your Peercoin address: 5 pointsTo find out more about Peercoin and why you should join this contest, check this article: https://coinmarketcap.com/community/articles/33825* Note: Distribution will be done one week after the airdrop ends by the Peercoin team
